mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment ( userIdx, nIdx, reservIdx, prodIdx, couponIdx, paymentType, orderId, paymentTransactionId, paymentMethod, paymentTotal, couponDiscount, pointDiscount, paymentFinal, paymentStatus, paymentDate ) VALUES ( #{userIdx}, #{nIdx}, #{reservIdx}, #{prodIdx}, #{couponIdx}, #{paymentType}, #{orderId}, #{paymentTransactionId}, #{paymentMethod}, #{paymentTotal}, #{couponDiscount}, #{pointDiscount}, #{paymentFinal}, 0, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM payment WHERE userIdx = #{userIdx} ORDER BY paymentDate DESC
select p.paymentIdx, p.paymentType, p.paymentMethod, p.paymentFinal, p.paymentStatus, p.paymentDate, u.name from payment p INNER JOIN user u ON p.userIdx = u.userIdx

SELECT * FROM( SELECT @RN:=@RN+1 AS rnum, a.* FROM( SELECT p.paymentIdx, p.paymentType, p.paymentMethod, p.paymentFinal, p.paymentStatus, p.paymentDate, u.name FROM payment p INNER JOIN user u ON p.userIdx = u.userIdx
AND p.paymentDate = #{datepicker}
AND p.paymentStatus = 0
AND p.paymentStatus = 1
AND p.paymentType = 0
AND p.paymentType = 1
AND p.paymentType LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{payment_keyword}, '%')
AND p.paymentMethod LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{payment_keyword}, '%')
AND p.paymentStatus LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{payment_keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY paymentIdx DESC ) a, (SELECT @RN:=0) b ) c WHERE c.rnum BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.update: UPDATE payment SET paymentStatus = 1, -- 1: 취소 paymentCancelDate = NOW() WHERE paymentTransactionId = #{paymentKey}
mapper.select: SELECT m.name AS itemTitle, t.tName AS theaterInfo, tt.startTime AS screenDate, p.orderId, p.paymentDate, p.paymentType, p.paymentStatus, p.paymentTransactionId FROM payment p JOIN reservation r ON p.reservIdx = r.reservIdx JOIN nmember n ON r.nIdx = n.nIdx JOIN time_table tt ON r.timeTableIdx = tt.timeTableIdx JOIN movie m ON tt.mIdx = m.mIdx JOIN theater t ON tt.tIdx = t.tIdx WHERE n.name = #{name} AND n.phone = #{phone} AND p.orderId = #{orderId} AND n.password = #{password}
